title: [Large-Scale] English Oral Proficiency Simulation Program for Enhancing Communication Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of advanced mathematical concepts and basic English communication skills
context.additional_context: Field-oriented English communication training program for in-service mathematics professionals, emphasizing situational simulation tasks using digital devices.

learning_goals: Improve fluency (Fluency) in English oral presentations by 30% six months after simulation-based tasks
Achieve 40% improvement in linguistic accuracy (Accuracy) during expert-level discussion scenarios
25% increase in linguistic complexity when explaining complex mathematical concepts in an academic context
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
